Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-50200 affecting package rabbitmq-server for versions less than 3.13.7-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-50200 affecting package rabbitmq-server for versions less than 3.13.7-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package rabbitmq-server is earlier than 3.13.7-3, affected by CVE-2025-50200
